name: AI Meta-Skills Primer
features: Add a 'case study' section with real-world examples of how these skills are applied.
Include a self-assessment tool to help users identify their strengths and weaknesses.
Add a 'resources' section with links to relevant books, articles, and courses.
Create a 'community' section where users can discuss the skills and share their experiences.
Develop a 'certification' program for users who demonstrate mastery of the skills.

name: AI Future-Proof Skills
features: Add a 'job board' with listings for AI-related roles.
Include interviews with professionals working in AI.
Add a 'skill tree' to visualize how different skills relate to each other.
Create a 'personalized learning path' feature that recommends skills based on a user's goals.
Develop a 'mentorship' program to connect users with experienced professionals.

name: A-Z Lists
features: Add the ability to create nested lists.
Include a 'random item' feature to help users make decisions.
Add a 'collaboration' feature to allow multiple users to edit a list.
Create a 'template' library for common types of lists (e.g., grocery lists, to-do lists).
Develop a 'sharing' feature to allow users to share their lists with others.

name: Arizona Plants Guide
features: Add a 'photo identification' feature that allows users to identify plants from a photo.
Include a 'map' feature that shows where different plants can be found in Arizona.
Add a 'gardening journal' to help users track their progress.
Create a 'community' section where users can share photos and tips.
Develop a 'plant of the day' feature to highlight a new plant each day.

name: Conversion Calculators
features: Add a 'currency converter' with real-time exchange rates.
Include a 'custom converter' feature that allows users to create their own conversion types.
Add a 'history' feature to save previous conversions.
Create a 'favorites' feature to allow users to quickly access their most-used converters.
Develop a 'dark mode' for the user interface.

name: Evolutionary Psychology Primer
features: Add a 'quiz' feature to test users' knowledge of the concepts.
Include interviews with evolutionary psychologists.
Add a 'timeline' of key discoveries in the field.
Create a 'glossary' of key terms.
Develop a 'case study' section with real-world examples of the concepts in action.

name: Prompting Toolkit Index
features: Add a 'search' feature to make it easier to find specific tools.
Include a 'rating' system to allow users to rate the different tools.
Add a 'comments' section for each tool.
Create a 'tutorial' for each tool to explain how to use it.
Develop a 'user submissions' feature to allow users to submit their own tools.

name: macOS Shortcuts
features: Add a 'quiz' feature to help users memorize the shortcuts.
Include a 'customizable' cheat sheet that allows users to choose which shortcuts to display.
Add a 'search' feature to make it easier to find specific shortcuts.
Create a 'most used shortcuts' section.
Develop a 'shortcut of the day' feature.

name: Prompt Generator
features: Add a 'random prompt' feature.
Include a 'prompt library' with pre-made prompts for different tasks.
Add a 'collaboration' feature to allow multiple users to work on a prompt together.
Create a 'prompt analysis' tool that provides feedback on the quality of a prompt.
Develop a 'prompt history' feature to save previous prompts.

name: Prompt Templates
features: Add a 'search' feature to make it easier to find specific templates.
Include a 'rating' system to allow users to rate the different templates.
Add a 'comments' section for each template.
Create a 'user submissions' feature to allow users to submit their own templates.
Develop a 'template of the week' feature.

name: Prompting Primer
features: Add a 'video' version of the primer.
Include interactive exercises to help users practice their prompting skills.
Add a 'case study' section with real-world examples of prompt engineering.
Create a 'community' section where users can discuss prompt engineering and share their tips.
Develop a 'certification' program for users who demonstrate mastery of prompt engineering.

name: Report on AI Agents
features: Add a 'live' Q&A session with the authors of the report.
Include a 'downloadable' PDF version of the report.
Add a 'comments' section for each section of the report.
Create a 'related resources' section with links to other articles and reports on AI agents.
Develop a 'subscribe' feature to notify users of future reports.

name: Spanish Primer
features: Add a 'pronunciation' guide with audio examples.
Include a 'flashcard' feature to help users memorize vocabulary.
Add a 'conversation' practice feature with a chatbot.
Create a 'grammar' guide with detailed explanations of Spanish grammar rules.
Develop a 'progress tracker' to help users monitor their learning.

name: Talk Smarter
features: Add a 'video' version of the primer.
Include interactive exercises to help users practice their speaking skills.
Add a 'case study' section with real-world examples of spontaneous speaking.
Create a 'community' section where users can discuss spontaneous speaking and share their tips.
Develop a 'certification' program for users who demonstrate mastery of spontaneous speaking.

name: LLM Study Guide
features: Add a 'quiz' feature to test users' knowledge of the concepts.
Include interviews with LLM researchers and engineers.
Add a 'timeline' of key developments in LLM research.
Create a 'glossary' of key terms.
Develop a 'case study' section with real-world examples of LLMs in action.

name: Screenwriter's Prompt Companion
features: Add a 'character' generator to help screenwriters create new characters.
Include a 'plot' generator to help screenwriters come up with new story ideas.
Add a 'dialogue' generator to help screenwriters write more natural-sounding dialogue.
Create a 'beat sheet' template to help screenwriters structure their stories.
Develop a 'collaboration' feature to allow multiple screenwriters to work on a script together.

name: Statistical Fallacy Spotter
features: Add a 'quiz' feature to test users' knowledge of the fallacies.
Include a 'real-world examples' section with examples of fallacies from the news and social media.
Add a 'submit a fallacy' feature to allow users to submit their own examples of fallacies.
Create a 'fallacy of the day' feature.
Develop a 'leaderboard' to track the users who are best at spotting fallacies.

name: Stoic Quote Provider
features: Add a 'journal' feature to allow users to write down their reflections on the quotes.
Include a 'biography' of each philosopher.
Add a 'related quotes' feature to show users other quotes that are similar to the one they are reading.
Create a 'community' section where users can discuss the quotes and share their interpretations.
Develop a 'quote of the day' widget for users' home screens.

name: Future Projects
features: Add a 'voting' feature to allow users to vote for the projects they are most interested in.
Include a 'comments' section for each project idea.
Add a 'progress tracker' to show the status of each project.
Create a 'subscribe' feature to notify users when a new project is launched.
Develop a 'submit an idea' feature to allow users to submit their own project ideas.

name: Vocabulary Builder
features: Add a 'quiz' feature to test users' knowledge of the words.
Include a 'spaced repetition' system to help users remember the words.
Add a 'related words' feature to show users other words that are similar to the one they are learning.
Create a 'community' section where users can discuss the words and share their own example sentences.
Develop a 'word of the day' widget for users' home screens.

name: Space Invaders
features: Add a 'high score' leaderboard.
Include different types of invaders with different abilities.
Add power-ups for the player's ship.
Create different levels with increasing difficulty.
Develop a 'two-player' mode.

name: Cognitive Bias Explorer
features: Add a 'quiz' feature to test users' knowledge of the biases.
Include a 'real-world examples' section with examples of biases from the news and social media.
Add a 'submit a bias' feature to allow users to submit their own examples of biases.
Create a 'bias of the day' feature.
Develop a 'leaderboard' to track the users who are best at spotting biases.
